name: Night of the Shrub Part 2
description: Night of the Shrub Part 2 is a short, visual novel, with a single storyline rife with odd happenings - The continuing adventures of Shrub and his friends as they wind their way through the creepy Old Twermbly Place.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2 Ghz single core Memory: 6 MB RAM Graphics: 128 MB graphics card Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2 Ghz single core Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: 1GB graphics card Storage: 100 MB available space
